meanings.definition: A painting or photograph of the sea.
meanings.sent1: The artist's seapieces captured the beauty of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I love looking at seapieces in art galleries.
meanings.sent3: The seapieces on the wall made me feel like I was sailing.
meanings.sent4: Her seapieces were like windows to the ocean's soul.
meanings.sent5: The seapieces brought the salty breeze into the room.

meanings.definition: A collection of artistic works depicting the sea.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a stunning exhibit of seapieces.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a valuable collection of seapieces from her grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The seapieces in the gallery told stories of the sea's adventures.
meanings.sent4: His seapieces formed a gallery of ocean dreams.
meanings.sent5: The seapieces filled the room with the sound of crashing waves.
